title: Futzol Court, Newly Renovated 1- and 2-Bedroom Homes
posting_body: ['One Bedroom Units: $300 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Two Bedroom Units: $400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Welcome to Estrella Apartments Homes', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 6', 'OR Text', '6', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 565 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'At Estrella Apartments, our homes feature charming living spaces with modern designs and fixtures and plenty of natural light.', 'You can enjoy entertaining friends or simply a peaceful respite from busy city living.', 'You will have access to a beautiful, sparkling swimming pool, and a picnic area with BBQ stations, as well as a community playground.', 'We also offer a fully equipped fitness center and a convenient business center.', 'Our dedicated management staff is here to give you the finest apartment living experience in Colorado – Denver apartments that thrill and amaze at every turn.', 'Come and see what makes Estrella different, and allow us to take you on your private tour today!', 'Features:', 'Wood Like Flooring, Modern Appliance Package, Newly Renovated 1- and 2-Bedroom Homes, Elegant Ceiling Fans in every Home, Heat & Air Conditioning', 'Community Amenities:', 'Fitness Center, Futzol Court, Sparking Swimming Pool with Community BBQ Grilling Area, Pet-Friendly Community, On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, and On-Call Courtesy Patrol, Business Center, Outdoor Playground, Elevators, On-Site Laundry Facility in each Building, Bike Racks Throughout Community', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'v5RAmzz2YYS']
